review: As a former Roku (2 year) user, switched to Fire to reduce buffering/re-buffering and image mottling issues.  For the most part, both issues resolved but still have some buffering issues even though  a solid 8 meg download at the Fire unit.  Roku had great customer service but could never resolve the problem.  With the Fire 30 day free trial, why not try it?
